about_the_game:
visual Novel, Adv, Fantasy, otome

Gwen is an experienced werewolf mercenary. One day, she comes across a simple and very monetary order. But who is her mysterious customer? And will it be so easy to get to destination alive? New friends, old enemies and maybe a meeting with love... Or maybe the promised hundred gold coins are to blame for everything?!
Particular features:
  • Full character branches
  • Two male characters to romance
  • A Sudden Plot Twist
  • Strong main character
  • Fantasy genre
  • Lots of action
  • A little werewolves and magic
  • Intrigue, secrets, investigations

content_descriptors.notes: Attention! The text contains descriptions of scenes of violence, murder, and alcohol consumption. Read with caution.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Core 4.2
  • Processor: 1.44GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: любая
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Core 4.2
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Любая
